summary_md: The Russian Federation, in the latest year, has a GDP per capita (11,043 USD per person), an inflation rate (6.69%), an unemployment rate (2.53%), average life expectancy (73.25 years), internet usage (92.20%), and a share of GDP from exports (21.92%).

sections.economy_md: The country's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita (11,043 USD per person), with a significant portion of its GDP derived from exports (21.92%).
sections.labor_md: Labor market indicators show an unemployment rate (2.53%) and a life expectancy (73.25 years), reflecting the overall health of the workforce.
sections.digital_md: Digital connectivity is evidenced by internet usage (92.20%), indicating the level of technological integration within the population.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy (73.25 years) provides insight into the health environment and quality of life in the country.
